title: AMC's NOS4A2 Review
itunes:title: AMC's NOS4A2 Review
itunes:subtitle: The Losers review AMC's highly anticipated TV adaptation of Joe Hill's NOS4A2 ahead of its Sunday night premiere. Prior to that, however, they share some Needful Tweets and visit Hollywood King. Convos range from a slightly heated palaver ove...
description:
The Losers review AMC's highly anticipated TV adaptation of Joe Hill's NOS4A2 ahead of its Sunday night premiere. Prior to that, however, they share some Needful Tweets and visit Hollywood King. Convos range from a slightly heated palaver over HBO's Game of Thrones, a meditation on Amazon's The Dark Tower and Hulu's The Eyes of the Dragon, and, naturally, talk of the best apps at Applebees.


Chapters include: Intro, Needful Tweets (5:00), Hollywood King (45:00), and NOS4A2 (1:25:00)


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon
